DOC.brief_summary: Irisin identify novel myokine drive brown-fat-like conversion white adipose tissue . In cross-sectional study , research investigate whether serum irisin level decrease patient sarcopenia compare control subject normal muscle mass , assess association serum irisin level various metabolic parameter .
